id: Your shots did not produce anything useful
en: Your shots did not produce anything useful

id: Target is outside of our range sir !
en: Target is outside of our range sir !
fr: La cible est hors de porté Commandant !

id: Scanners have discovered an Anomaly close by
en: Scanners have discovered an Anomaly close by
fr: Le radar à détecté une anomalie dans les environs

id: Which ship should we transfer control ?
en: Which ship should we transfer control ?

id: The Converter of Yendor uses the energy of the wormhole itself to rip a hole trough space. You spool up the engines and glide through it. On the other side HOME is waiting ! You made it !
en: The Converter of Yendor uses the energy of the wormhole itself to rip a hole trough space. You spool up the engines and glide through it. On the other side HOME is waiting ! You made it !
fr: Le convertisseur de Yendor assimile l’énergie du trou noir lui-même et ouvre une brèche dans l’espace. Sans hésiter, vous engagé les réacteurs. De l’autre côté, un monde familié vous attend, vous avez réussi, vous êtes enfin chez vous !
ja: The Converter of Yendor uses the energy of the wormhole itself to rip a hole trough space. You spool up the engines and glide through it. On the other side HOME is waiting ! You made it !

id: The Converter of Yendor will not work unless it is mounted on the ship !
en: The Converter of Yendor will not work unless it is mounted on the ship !
fr: Le convertisseur de Yendor doit être monté sur le vaisseau!
ja: The Converter of Yendor will not work unless it is mounted on the ship !

id: [color=yellow]This wormhole emits a strange energy signature that prevents you from jumping back home![/color]
en: [color=yellow]This wormhole emits a strange energy signature that prevents you from jumping back home![/color]
fr: [color=yellow]Ce trou noir émet une énergie inconnue qui vous empêche de retourner chez vous[/color]
ja: [color=yellow]This wormhole emits a strange energy signature that prevents you from jumping back home![/color]

id: All controls transfered, the ship is ours captain !
en: All controls transfered, the ship is ours captain !
fr: Transfer complété, le vaisseau nous appartient Commandant!
ja: All controls transfered, the ship is ours captain !

id: We have too much cargo, choose what to leave behind before we go
en: We have too much cargo, choose what to leave behind before we go
fr: Nous avons trop de cargo, choisissez ce que nous laisserons ici
ja: We have too much cargo, choose what to leave behind before we go

id: We should transfer any remaining items from %s before
en: We should transfer any remaining items from %s before
fr: %s contient encore des items qui doivent être transféré avant
ja: We should transfer any remaining items from %s before

id: The tractor beam failed to lock on
en: The tractor beam failed to lock on
fr: Le rayon tracteur n’a rien trouvé
ja: The tractor beam failed to lock on

fr: Le rayon tracteur a ramené %s à bord

id: This planet has a colony, let's not push our luck
en: This planet has a colony, let's not push our luck
fr: Cette planète est colonisée, n’exagérons pas
ja: This planet has a colony, let's not push our luck

id: [color=red]This planet had a colony and they are NOT happy. They've deployed defenses.[/color]
en: [color=red]This planet had a colony and they are NOT happy. They've deployed defenses.[/color]
fr: [color=red]Cette planète a une colonie. Ils ont déployé leurs défenses.[/color]
ja: [color=red]This planet had a colony and they are NOT happy. They've deployed defenses.[/color]

id: Some useful materials float into orbit
en: Some useful materials float into orbit
fr: Des matériaux utiles flottent en orbite
ja: Some useful materials float into orbit

fr: [color=red]Vous avez détruit un de vos propre vaisseau ![/color]

id: [color=yellow]The anomaly has corrupted your warp drives, engine at half power[/color]
en: [color=yellow]The anomaly has corrupted your warp drives, engine at half power[/color]
fr: [color=yellow]L’anomalie affecte les réacteurs, vitesse réduite à 50%[/color]
ja: [color=yellow]The anomaly has corrupted your warp drives, engine at half power[/color]

id: [color=yellow]The anomaly is syphoning energy from the ship ![/color]
en: [color=yellow]The anomaly is syphoning energy from the ship ![/color]
ja: [color=yellow]The anomaly is syphoning energy from the ship ![/color]

id: [color=lime]The anomaly was full of free energy, we're gaining energy ![/color]
en: [color=lime]The anomaly was full of free energy, we're gaining energy ![/color]
fr: [color=lime]L’anomalie à une charge énergétique si dense qu’elle recharge le vaisseau ![/color]
ja: [color=lime]The anomaly was full of free energy, we're gaining energy ![/color]

id: [color=yellow]A magnetic pulse from the Anomaly has disabled our scanners ![/color]
en: [color=yellow]A magnetic pulse from the Anomaly has disabled our scanners ![/color]
fr: [color=yellow]Le champs électro-magnétique de l’anomalie corrompt notre radar ![/color]
ja: [color=yellow]A magnetic pulse from the Anomaly has disabled our scanners ![/color]

id: [color=lime]The anomaly resonate with our scanners giving them a boost ![/color]
en: [color=lime]The anomaly resonate with our scanners giving them a boost ![/color]
fr: [color=lime]Les ondes magnétiques de l’anomalie résonnent avec notre radar et augmente sa porté ![/color]
ja: [color=lime]The anomaly resonate with our scanners giving them a boost ![/color]

id: No selected item can be used like that
en: No selected item can be used like that
fr: Aucun objet ne peut être utilisé
ja: No selected item can be used like that

id: MAN(1) Solar Rogue General Commands Manual
en: MAN(1) Solar Rogue General Commands Manual
fr: MAN(1) Solar Rogue Manuel des Commandes
ja: MAN(1) Solar Rogue General Commands Manual

en:
Captain, Lets refill our energy by converting this %s
1. Select 'Recycle Energy' from the list on the left
2. Select the '%s' on the right
3. Click the 'Craft' Button
fr:
Commandant, Récupérons de l’énergie en convertissant %s
1. Choisir ‘Recyclage’ dans la liste de gauche
2. Choisir %s à droite
3. Cliquer sur le bouton ‘Produire’
ja:
Captain, Lets refill our energy by converting this %s
1. Select 'Recycle Energy' from the list on the left
2. Select the '%s' on the right
3. Click the 'Craft' Button

en: Captain, To equip our new %s just select it in the cargo list on the right and select the 'mount' button to install or replace the currently equiped %s
fr: Commandant, Pour équiper notre nouveau %s il suffit de le sélectionner dans la liste à droite et cliquer sur le bouton ‘monté’ pour l’installer ou remplacé le %s actuel
ja: Captain, To equip our new %s just select it in the cargo list on the right and select the 'mount' button to install or replace the currently equiped %s

en: Captain, order the helm to move by using the numpad keys, clicking or taping the screen\n\n[i]You can turn off tutorial prompts in the settings[/i]
fr: Commandant, donnez vos ordres au pilote avec le pavé numérique, en cliquant ou en tapant dans l’écran\n\n[i]Vous pouvez désactiver les tutoriels dans le menu d’options[/i]
ja: Captain, order the helm to move by using the numpad keys, clicking or taping the screen\n\n[i]You can turn off tutorial prompts in the settings[/i]

en: Captain, an unkown ship has entered our scanner range. It's weapon are powered-up and it's headed for our us.\n\nTarget deemed hostile will be marked in [color=red]red[/color].
fr: Commandant, Un vaisseau inconnu s’approche. Nous détectons un armement et ils sont en approche.\n\nLes cibles hostiles seront marquées en [color=red]rouge[/color]
ja: Captain, an unkown ship has entered our scanner range. It's weapon are powered-up and it's headed for our us.\n\nTarget deemed hostile will be marked in [color=red]red[/color].

en:
Captain, an unkown ship has entered our scanner range. No weapon signature detected, it's ignoring us.

Target deemed neutral will be marked in [color=blue]blue[/color].

[i]hint: they're easy pickings...[/i]
fr:
Commandant, un vaisseau inconnu s’approche. Il n’est pas armé et semble nous ignorer.

Les cibles neutres seront marquées en [color=blue]bleu[/color].

[i]conseil : Ce sont des cibles faciles…[/i]
ja:
Captain, an unkown ship has entered our scanner range. No weapon signature detected, it's ignoring us.

Target deemed neutral will be marked in [color=blue]blue[/color].

[i]hint: they're easy pickings...[/i]

en: Captain, this is one of our ships. We can board it and transfer equipments.\n\nBoardable targets will be marked in white.
fr: Commandant, Ce vaisseau fait parti de notre flotte. Nous pouvons transférer contrôles et équipements.\n\nLes cibles contrôlables seront marquées en blanc
ja: Captain, this is one of our ships. We can board it and transfer equipments.\n\nBoardable targets will be marked in white.

en: Captain, the ship's scanners have detected a planet close by. We should get close within firing range and shoot a few missiles, we could get useful materials from the debris.
fr: Commandant, Nos radars indique une planète à proximité. Nous devrions nous en approcher et faire feu, les planètes contiennent généralement des matériaux utiles.
ja: Captain, the ship's scanners have detected a planet close by. We should get close within firing range and shoot a few missiles, we could get useful materials from the debris.

en: Captain, the ship's scanners have detected base elements that could be used to power the ship. Get on top of it and use the tractor beam to bring it into our cargo holds.
fr: Commandant, Nos radars ont détecté des éléments de base pouvant servir à alimenter le vaisseau. Dirigez-vous dessus et utilisez le rayon tracteur pour les amener à bord
ja: Captain, the ship's scanners have detected base elements that could be used to power the ship. Get on top of it and use the tractor beam to bring it into our cargo holds.

en: Captain, we've picked up an item that could be used to refuel the ship. click on the [c]onv button to warm up our energy-to-matter converter
fr: Commandant, nous avons dans nos soutes un item qui pourrait ré-énergiser le vaisseau. Cliquez sur le bouton [c]onv pour réchauffer notre convertisseur d’énergie
ja: Captain, we've picked up an item that could be used to refuel the ship. click on the [c]onv button to warm up our energy-to-matter converter

en: Captain, we've picked up an item that could be mounted on our ship. Please head to the inventory screen for more info.
fr: Commandant, nous avons dans nos soutes un item qui pourrait être monté sur le vaisseau. Allez dans l’inventaire pour plus d’information.
ja: Captain, we've picked up an item that could be mounted on our ship. Please head to the inventory screen for more info.

fr: Merci d'avoir joué à Solar Rogue !

en: Are you sure ?\nThe Savegame will be deleted
ja: Are you sure ?\nThe Savegame will be deleted

id: Tiny nanobots go out and fuse with the hull to repair it over time.
en: Tiny nanobots go out and fuse with the hull to repair it over time.
fr: Robots microscopiques qui peuvent fusionner avec la coque du vaisseau pour le réparer. Le processus prend plusieurs tours.
ja: Tiny nanobots go out and fuse with the hull to repair it over time.

id: A handy device that can convert any matter into energy and vice-versa. More advanced blueprints require military grade converter.
en: A handy device that can convert any matter into energy and vice-versa. More advanced blueprints require military grade converter.
fr: Une machine très pratique qui peut transformer n’importe quoi en énergie et vice-versa. Les recettes plus complexes demandent un convertisseur militarisé.
ja: A handy device that can convert any matter into energy and vice-versa. More advanced blueprints require military grade converter.

id: This device seems to bend the fabric of space and time itself to materialize anything you can dream of. Bring it back to the original wormhole to complete the game.
en: This device seems to bend the fabric of space and time itself to materialize anything you can dream of. Bring it back to the original wormhole to complete the game.
fr: Ce dispositif manipule le temps et l’espace directement pour matérialiser vos rêves les plus fous. Ramenez le au trou noir du début pour gagné la partie.
ja: This device seems to bend the fabric of space and time itself to materialize anything you can dream of. Bring it back to the original wormhole to complete the game.

id: A handy device that can convert any matter into energy and vice-versa. Contains the secret blueprints from the Jerg civilisation!
en: A handy device that can convert any matter into energy and vice-versa. Contains the secret blueprints from the Jerg civilisation!
fr: Une machine très pratique qui peut transformer n’importe quoi en énergie et vice-versa. Contiens les secrets de la civilisation Jerg!
ja: A handy device that can convert any matter into energy and vice-versa. Contains the secret blueprints from the Jerg civilisation!

id: A handy device that can convert any matter into energy and vice-versa. Contains the secret blueprints from the Vorg civilisation!
en: A handy device that can convert any matter into energy and vice-versa. Contains the secret blueprints from the Vorg civilisation!
fr: Une machine très pratique qui peut transformer n’importe quoi en énergie et vice-versa. Contiens les secrets de la civilisation Vorg!
ja: A handy device that can convert any matter into energy and vice-versa. Contains the secret blueprints from the Vorg civilisation!

id: The remains of this battleship hull are still in suprisingly good shape. They could be used as a scaffold for a new Battleship.
en: The remains of this battleship hull are still in suprisingly good shape. They could be used as a scaffold for a new Battleship.
fr: Les restes d’un cuirassé, surprenamment bien conservé. Ils pourraient servir de base à un nouveau Cuirassé.
ja: The remains of this battleship hull are still in suprisingly good shape. They could be used as a scaffold for a new Battleship.

id: The remains of this frigate hull are still in suprisingly good shape. They could be used as a scaffold for a new Frigate.
en: The remains of this frigate hull are still in suprisingly good shape. They could be used as a scaffold for a new Frigate.
fr: Les restes d’une frégates, surprenamment bien conservé. Ils pourraient servir de base à une nouvelle frégate.
ja: The remains of this frigate hull are still in suprisingly good shape. They could be used as a scaffold for a new Frigate.

id: The remains of this probe hull are still in suprisingly good shape. They could be used as a scaffold for a new Probe, but why ?
en: The remains of this probe hull are still in suprisingly good shape. They could be used as a scaffold for a new Probe, but why ?
fr: Les restes d’une sonde, surprenamment bien conservé. Ils pourraient servir de base à une nouvelle sonde, mais dans quel but?
ja: The remains of this probe hull are still in suprisingly good shape. They could be used as a scaffold for a new Probe, but why ?

id: The remains of this Scout hull are still in suprisingly good shape. They could be used as a scaffold for a new Scout.
en: The remains of this Scout hull are still in suprisingly good shape. They could be used as a scaffold for a new Scout.
fr: Les restes d’un éclaireur, surprenamment bien conservé. Ils pourraient servir de base à un nouvel éclaireur.
ja: The remains of this Scout hull are still in suprisingly good shape. They could be used as a scaffold for a new Scout.

id: An extremely hard crystalline mineral used as a power source. It is believed that this material exists in more than three dimensions at the same time and this is somehow related to its properties.
en: An extremely hard crystalline mineral used as a power source. It is believed that this material exists in more than three dimensions at the same time and this is somehow related to its properties.
fr: Un minéral cristallin souvent utilisé comme source d’énergie. On pense que ce matériel existe dans plus de trois dimensions à la fois lui conférant des propriétés hors du commun.
ja: An extremely hard crystalline mineral used as a power source. It is believed that this material exists in more than three dimensions at the same time and this is somehow related to its properties.

id: Hydrogen is the most abundant chemical substance in the Universe. It is a colorless, odorless, tasteless, non-toxic, nonmetallic, highly combustible diatomic gas.
en: Hydrogen is the most abundant chemical substance in the Universe. It is a colorless, odorless, tasteless, non-toxic, nonmetallic, highly combustible diatomic gas.
fr: L’Hydrogène est la substance la plus commune dans l’univers. Sans odeur, sans couleur, sans goût, non-toxique, non-métallique et extrêmement inflamable.
ja: Hydrogen is the most abundant chemical substance in the Universe. It is a colorless, odorless, tasteless, non-toxic, nonmetallic, highly combustible diatomic gas.

id: Oxygen is a highly reactive nonmetal, and an oxidizing agent that readily forms oxides. It is a colorless and odorless diatomic gas.
en: Oxygen is a highly reactive nonmetal, and an oxidizing agent that readily forms oxides. It is a colorless and odorless diatomic gas.
fr: L'oxygène est un non-métal qui forme très facilement des composés, notamment des oxydes, avec pratiquement tous les autres éléments chimiques. Cette facilité se traduit par des énergies de formation élevées.
ja: Oxygen is a highly reactive nonmetal, and an oxidizing agent that readily forms oxides. It is a colorless and odorless diatomic gas.

id: Uranium is a fissile isotope, which makes it widely used in nuclear power plants and nuclear weapons. In sufficient concentration, we can maintain a sustained nuclear chain reaction.
en: Uranium is a fissile isotope, which makes it widely used in nuclear power plants and nuclear weapons. In sufficient concentration, we can maintain a sustained nuclear chain reaction.
fr: L’Uranium est un isotope radioactif ce qui le rend très populaire comme source d’énergie dans les réacteurs nucléaires.
ja: Uranium is a fissile isotope, which makes it widely used in nuclear power plants and nuclear weapons. In sufficient concentration, we can maintain a sustained nuclear chain reaction.

id: This extra-powerful radar extends beyond the average weapon range allowing us time to get into a flanking position before battle.
en: This extra-powerful radar extends beyond the average weapon range allowing us time to get into a flanking position before battle.
fr: Un radar particulièrement puissant qui permet de voir l’ennemi avant qu’il soit à distance de tir ce qui nous permet de nous positionner avantageusement avant la bataille.
ja: This extra-powerful radar extends beyond the average weapon range allowing us time to get into a flanking position before battle.

id: This advanced Radar can detect large gravitational shifts within a solar system.
en: This advanced Radar can detect large gravitational shifts within a solar system.
fr: Ce radar amélioré arrive à repérer les larges sources de perturbation gravitationnelle dans tout le système solaire.
ja: This advanced Radar can detect large gravitational shifts within a solar system.

id: This advanced Radar can detect minute gravitational shifts within a solar system.
en: This advanced Radar can detect minute gravitational shifts within a solar system.
fr: Ce radar utilise une version très précise d’analyse permettant de repérer toutes les sources de perturbation gravitationnelle.
ja: This advanced Radar can detect minute gravitational shifts within a solar system.

id: Space is vast and dark. Only radars can allow us to see objects in space. This one barely manages to do even that.
en: Space is vast and dark. Only radars can allow us to see objects in space. This one barely manages to do even that.
fr: Un vaisseau sans radar est aveugle dans les limites infinis de l’espace. Les radars sont nos yeux et ce radar est myope.
ja: Space is vast and dark. Only radars can allow us to see objects in space. This one barely manages to do even that.

id: This Radar can detect large gravitational shifts within a solar system but provide limited range.
en: This Radar can detect large gravitational shifts within a solar system but provide limited range.
fr: Ce radar peut détecter les perturbations gravitationnelles dans tout le système solaire mais ses autres systèmes sont plutôt limité.
ja: This Radar can detect large gravitational shifts within a solar system but provide limited range.

id: This Radar can detect minute gravitational shifts within a solar system but provides limited range.
en: This Radar can detect minute gravitational shifts within a solar system but provides limited range.
fr: Ce radar peut détecter les plus petites perturbations gravitationnelles mais personne n’a encore pensé à amélioré le reste
ja: This Radar can detect minute gravitational shifts within a solar system but provides limited range.

id: This unique artifact seems to have been built by an ancient race using lost technology. It seems to be able to see everywhere at once using quantum entanglement.
en: This unique artifact seems to have been built by an ancient race using lost technology. It seems to be able to see everywhere at once using quantum entanglement.
fr: Un radar sans doute construit par une race ancienne utilisant une technologie oublié. Il semble capable de voir tout en même temps grâce à l’enchevêtrement quantique
ja: This unique artifact seems to have been built by an ancient race using lost technology. It seems to be able to see everywhere at once using quantum entanglement.

id: A type of force field that surrounds the ship protecting it against all form of energy and projectile weaponry. Consumes large amount of energy and recharges slowly over time. Stacked shields offer diminishing returns.
en: A type of force field that surrounds the ship protecting it against all form of energy and projectile weaponry. Consumes large amount of energy and recharges slowly over time. Stacked shields offer diminishing returns.
fr: Un champs de force qui protège un vaisseau de tout élément hostile. Utilise de grande quantité d’énergie et se recharge lentement. Il y a peut de gain à utiliser plus de 3 boucliers en même temps.
ja: A type of force field that surrounds the ship protecting it against all form of energy and projectile weaponry. Consumes large amount of energy and recharges slowly over time. Stacked shields offer diminishing returns.

id: A military grade force field that surrounds the ship protecting it against all form of energy and projectile weaponry. Consumes large amount of energy and recharges slowly over time. Stacked shields offer diminishing returns.
en: A military grade force field that surrounds the ship protecting it against all form of energy and projectile weaponry. Consumes large amount of energy and recharges slowly over time. Stacked shields offer diminishing returns.
fr: Un champs de force réserver aux militaires qui protège un vaisseau de tout élément hostile. Utilise de grande quantité d’énergie et se recharge lentement. Il y a peut de gain à utiliser plus de 3 boucliers en même temps.
ja: A military grade force field that surrounds the ship protecting it against all form of energy and projectile weaponry. Consumes large amount of energy and recharges slowly over time. Stacked shields offer diminishing returns.

id: A type of advanced force field that surrounds the ship protecting it against all form of energy and projectile weaponry. Consumes large amount of energy and recharges slowly over time. Stacked shields offer diminishing returns.
en: A type of advanced force field that surrounds the ship protecting it against all form of energy and projectile weaponry. Consumes large amount of energy and recharges slowly over time. Stacked shields offer diminishing returns.
fr: Un champs de force extrêmenent puissant qui protège un vaisseau de tout élément hostile. Utilise de grande quantité d’énergie et se recharge lentement. Il y a peut de gain à utiliser plus de 3 boucliers en même temps.
ja: A type of advanced force field that surrounds the ship protecting it against all form of energy and projectile weaponry. Consumes large amount of energy and recharges slowly over time. Stacked shields offer diminishing returns.

id: Through gravity manipulation this assembly creates a localized warp field inside the cargo bay, effectively reducing cargo size by a significant factor. Stacked compactor provide diminishing returns.
en: Through gravity manipulation this assembly creates a localized warp field inside the cargo bay, effectively reducing cargo size by a significant factor. Stacked compactor provide diminishing returns.
fr: Cet outil crée une bulle d’espace-temps dans la soutes ce qui à pour effet de compresser le cargo et donc d’augmenter le volume disponible de magnière significative. Les compacteur sub-séquent ne pourront pas donner le même rendement.
ja: Through gravity manipulation this assembly creates a localized warp field inside the cargo bay, effectively reducing cargo size by a significant factor. Stacked compactor provide diminishing returns.

id: Don't bother running. You'll just die tired. Extra damage at the cost of energy.
en: Don't bother running. You'll just die tired. Extra damage at the cost of energy.
fr: Pourquoi courir? Vous allez vous épuisez. Échanger de l’énergie pour plus de dommage.
ja: Don't bother running. You'll just die tired. Extra damage at the cost of energy.

id: Solar panels mounted on the ship's hull provide passive energy regeneration. Stacked panels will provide dimishing returns.
en: Solar panels mounted on the ship's hull provide passive energy regeneration. Stacked panels will provide dimishing returns.
fr: Des panneaux solaires installé sur la coque du vaisseau recharge automatiquement notre énergie. Installer plusieurs panneaux n’offre pas un retour linéaire.
ja: Solar panels mounted on the ship's hull provide passive energy regeneration. Stacked panels will provide dimishing returns.

id: Highly cohesive beam of high-energy photons allows long range targetting in a straight line.
en: Highly cohesive beam of high-energy photons allows long range targetting in a straight line.
fr: Un appareil qui produit un rayonnement lumineux spatialement et temporellement cohérent. Permet de tirer sur de longues distances mais en ligne droite seulement.
ja: Highly cohesive beam of high-energy photons allows long range targetting in a straight line.

id: Ammo for the Missile Launcher. Missiles have four system components: targeting, flight system, engine, and warhead
en: Ammo for the Missile Launcher. Missiles have four system components: targeting, flight system, engine, and warhead
fr: Munition pour le lance-missile. Un missile est composé de 4 éléments : système de ciblé, système de propulsion, système de contrôle et explosif.
ja: Ammo for the Missile Launcher. Missiles have four system components: targeting, flight system, engine, and warhead

id: Launches a flurry of guided-missile to any target in the viscinity. Due to it's slow speed, range is limited.
en: Launches a flurry of guided-missile to any target in the viscinity. Due to it's slow speed, range is limited.
fr: Lance une rafale de missiles guidés vers la cible la plus proche. Parce qu’ils doivent être accélérer, leur porté est limité
ja: Launches a flurry of guided-missile to any target in the viscinity. Due to it's slow speed, range is limited.

id: Launches a flurry of guided-missile to any target in the viscinity. Improved launch sequence allow for slightly bigger range.
en: Launches a flurry of guided-missile to any target in the viscinity. Improved launch sequence allow for slightly bigger range.
fr: Lance une rafale de missiles guidés vers la cible la plus proche. Cette version viens avec un système de pré-lancement qui augmente la porté.
ja: Launches a flurry of guided-missile to any target in the viscinity. Improved launch sequence allow for slightly bigger range.

id: Launches a flurry of guided-missile to any target in the viscinity. Extra missile bays allow for stacked shooting and reloading, allowing near-continuous shooting.
en: Launches a flurry of guided-missile to any target in the viscinity. Extra missile bays allow for stacked shooting and reloading, allowing near-continuous shooting.
fr: Lance une rafale de missiles guidés vers la cible la plus proche. Cette version viens avec plusieurs tubes placés en série permettant un tir presque ininterrompu de missile.
ja: Launches a flurry of guided-missile to any target in the viscinity. Extra missile bays allow for stacked shooting and reloading, allowing near-continuous shooting.

id: Ammo for the Torpedo Launcher. It's massive but it makes even bigger holes !
en: Ammo for the Torpedo Launcher. It's massive but it makes even bigger holes !
fr: Munition pour le lance-torpille. Nettement plus gros qu’un missile, les trous qu’ils font sont encore plus impressionnant!
ja: Ammo for the Torpedo Launcher. It's massive but it makes even bigger holes !

id: Can hit multiple enemies in a area. A short fuse prevents nearby detonation. Sadly it's not long enough to hit far away targets.
en: Can hit multiple enemies in a area. A short fuse prevents nearby detonation. Sadly it's not long enough to hit far away targets.
fr: L’explosion touche les cases avoisinante. Une courte mèche empêche les détonations trop risqué. Malheureusement elle empêche aussi les tirs longues portés.
ja: Can hit multiple enemies in a area. A short fuse prevents nearby detonation. Sadly it's not long enough to hit far away targets.

id: Battleships are the most powerful type of warship. They have the most shields and weapons in the fleet but their size and mass makes them slow and expensive.
en: Battleships are the most powerful type of warship. They have the most shields and weapons in the fleet but their size and mass makes them slow and expensive.
fr: Les cuirassés sont les vaisseaux les plus puissant. Ils peuvent équiper un nombre impressionnant d’arme et de bouclier en même temps mais leur taille les rends également lent et dispendieux.
ja: Battleships are the most powerful type of warship. They have the most shields and weapons in the fleet but their size and mass makes them slow and expensive.

id: Similar in size to scouts but carries Torpedos. It'll blow everything up or die trying.
en: Similar in size to scouts but carries Torpedos. It'll blow everything up or die trying.
fr: Taille similaire aux éclaireurs mais transporte généralement des torpilles. Ils préfèrent tout faire sauter.
ja: Similar in size to scouts but carries Torpedos. It'll blow everything up or die trying.

id: A warship with mixed armaments generally used for convoy escort and support work. It's full of utility.
en: A warship with mixed armaments generally used for convoy escort and support work. It's full of utility.
fr: Vaisseau de guerre généralement utilisé comme escorte et support. Le canif suisse de la flotte.
ja: A warship with mixed armaments generally used for convoy escort and support work. It's full of utility.

id: Harmless. Originally designed to explore Uranus, it's now so far deep it can't see the sun. Comes with various telemetry equipment.
en: Harmless. Originally designed to explore Uranus, it's now so far deep it can't see the sun. Comes with various telemetry equipment.
fr: Inoffensif. Originalement envoyé pour étudier les planètes lointaines sa programmation originale est maintenant totalement désuettes. Viens équipé des meilleurs équipement de détection.
ja: Harmless. Originally designed to explore Uranus, it's now so far deep it can't see the sun. Comes with various telemetry equipment.

id: A small, fast ship for forward exploration.
en: A small, fast ship for forward exploration.
fr: Un vaisseau rapide de relativement petite taille pour l’exploration.
ja: A small, fast ship for forward exploration.

id: A small, fast ship for forward exploration. The Jerk Armada usually prefer laser over any other armament.
en: A small, fast ship for forward exploration. The Jerk Armada usually prefer laser over any other armament.
fr: Un vaisseau rapide de relativement petite taille pour l’exploration. L’armada Jerg favorise les armes photoniques par dessus tout.
ja: A small, fast ship for forward exploration. The Jerk Armada usually prefer laser over any other armament.

id: Fast but relatively weak ship. Vorg favour solid defense over anything, even their scout come with powerful shields
en: Fast but relatively weak ship. Vorg favour solid defense over anything, even their scout come with powerful shields
fr: Un vaisseau rapide de relativement petite taille pour l’exploration. Les Vorg préfèrent une défense solide avant tout et même leurs éclaireurs viennent équipés avec de puissant boucliers
ja: Fast but relatively weak ship. Vorg favour solid defense over anything, even their scout come with powerful shields

fr: Un vaisseau rapide mais plutôt fragile.

id: An unknown space anomaly. Scanners indicate that we have no idea what it does.
en: An unknown space anomaly. Scanners indicate that we have no idea what it does.
fr: Une Anomalie dans l’espace. Nos analyses ne nous permettent pas de déterminer son effet
ja: An unknown space anomaly. Scanners indicate that we have no idea what it does.

id: Similar in size to scouts but made to carry torpedos. Slightly heavier and slower but more resilient than Scouts.
en: Similar in size to scouts but made to carry torpedos. Slightly heavier and slower but more resilient than Scouts.
fr: De taille similaire aux éclaireurs mais transporte des torpilles. Un peu plus solide qu'un éclaireur mais aussi un peu plus lent.
ja: Similar in size to scouts but made to carry torpedos. Slightly heavier and slower but more resilient than Scouts.

id: Planets are a rich source of base materials for feeding the energy converter of the ship.
en: Planets are a rich source of base materials for feeding the energy converter of the ship.
fr: Les planètes sont de bonnes sources de ressources pour alimenter le convertisseur du vaisseau.
ja: Planets are a rich source of base materials for feeding the energy converter of the ship.
